name: Tears of Aesir
description:
Tears of the Aesir was built by 2 developers in 3 weekends for the AmazeMe Game Jam hosted by YoYoGames - Theme 'Neon'.
https://itch.io/jam/amaze-me-game-jam
https://yyg.itch.io/

It is the beginning of Ragnarok, the other Gods have gone missing. Take control of Tyr as you fight your way through the Nine Realms (just 1 for now) to find the fate of your friends and foes.

Sidescrolling-action roguelike.

WASD                      - Movement
Spacebar                  - Jump
Left Mouse Button - Attack
Tab                           - Show Upgrade Stats
F11                          - Fullscreen

Updates to come in the future.
